alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:57PM CST until March 06 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, South Itasca, Crow Wing and Northern Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area and the Mille Lacs Band, Big Sandy Lake area. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; South Itasca
